name: RPG-In-A-Loop
description:
You wake up in a dark, creepy dungeon. 

You don't remember why and how you are there. 

The only exit seems to be blocked. 

You have nothing to do but explore. 

As soon as you begin to meet and to interact creatures, you realize you need to collect four slabs of slate to reassemble an oracle. 
This can generate only one potion of knowledge or one potion of freedom. 

What are you going to do? 

Are you going to be friendly or aggressive?
Are you going to reassemble the oracle?
And finally, what are you choosing: freedom or knowledge?
